1669590.name: COYOTE
1669590.description:
THROUGH THE MOUSEHOLE
Step into the shoes of a child playing alone by the abandoned supermarket named Coyote. Suddenly a strange kid in a mouse-costume appears, urging you to follow it. Where does it lead you? What magical tale could be hidden behind the desolate supermarket? Can you reach into your inner child and find out?



BUILD A NETWORK
In COYOTE you will be tasked with the care of plants and animals with different needs and possibilities. Do well, and your network of living beings will grow into a rich ecosystem. Will you be able to handle this dynamic environment, while balancing predators and prey in a perfect rhythm?


GROW AND THRIVE
As the game develops you face new challenges and missions to complete, each assigned with the emergence of different species. Complete your tasks and care well for your environment and you will learn new powers. These powers help you manipulate the everchanging world of COYOTE and are to be used with care!


ENTER THE SOULWORLD
The Soulworld, a parallel world to the real world, represents your connection to life itself and its essence: Soul. Meet the deputies of all beings within COYOTE and learn how to influence the souls in the real world.



THE SCIENCE OF COYOTE
The world of COYOTE is powered by the Trophix engine, which means it feels and acts like a real-life ecosystem. Introduce new elements or creatures, and the game world will react and change just like nature. With each new mission, more features are introduced, making the ecosystem increasingly diverse and complex.

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
